sys_sg_write_back_action_item.description: Action Item for Edit Program found on a Program form; allows the user to edit all fields found on the regular form
sys_sg_write_back_action_item.name: Edit Program AI
sys_sg_write_back_action_item.template: state={{State}}^priority={{Priority}}^x_mpaii_program_type={{Program Type}}^x_mpaii_restriction_type={{Access Rule}}^short_description={{Program Name}}^assigned_to={{Program Manager}}^description={{Description}}^x_mpaii_planned_start_date={{Planned Start Date}}^x_mpaii_planned_completion_date={{Planned Completion Date}}^x_mpaii_actual_start_date={{Actual Start Date}}^x_mpaii_actual_completion_date={{Actual Completion Date}}^EQ
